post:
We have invested our time strategizing and developing our cloud based Windows VPS platform, we want our clients to get the best bang for their buck, that is why we have made sure to provide robust hardware available in the form of Dell. You get the ability to scale on demand with instant setup. Your data is always safe as we provide regular offsite backups.

Let’s take a peek inside the Windows VPS plans being offered:

VPS Basic

  • CPU: 2 vCPUs
  • HDD: 40 GB
  • Bandwidth: 1TB
  • RAM: 2 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $34.99/month

VPS Standard

  • CPU: 4 vCPUs
  • HDD: 60 GB
  • Bandwidth: 1.5 TB
  • RAM: 4 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $49.99/month

VPS Enterprise

  • CPU: 6 vCPUs
  • HDD: 80 GB
  • Bandwidth: 2 TB
  • RAM: 6 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $64.99/month

VPS Corporate

  • CPU: 8 vCPUs
  • HDD: 100 GB
  • Bandwidth: 3 TB
  • RAM: 8 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $79.99/month

Operating System:

  • Linux OS: CentOS 6.x and 7.x / Fedora / Debian / Ubuntu
  • Windows OS: Windows 2012 R2 Standard

Control Panels:

  • CPanel/WHM with Softaculous: $12.00
  • Plesk Web Admin Edition: FREE
  • Plesk Web App Edition: $4.00
  • Plesk Web Pro Edition: $6.00
  • Plesk Web Host Edition: $10.00

Have a question?

Feel free to contact our sales team via Live Chat!
